categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dhuramav was a male Human supply officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Galactic Republic forces under Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan.

Supply Officer Dhuramav appears as an Imperial Agent gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. He was later removed during a gear system restructuring.
